name: Cleva
headline: USD banking platform for Africa
description: Cleva enables African freelancers and businesses to receive international payment for their service, while protecting themselves from local currency volatility. With a Cleva USD account, one can easily receive USD payment from anywhere in the world, spend via a card, pay bills, convert to local currency, and save in USD to hedge against local currency volatility.

founders.name: Tolu Alabi, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Tolu brings relevant experience from her time as a Lead Product Manager building Issuing and Banking products at Stripe. Prior to Stripe, she was a Senior PM at Amazon working on multiple products from Logistics to Augmented Reality. In addition, she has an MBA from Stanford GSB and a B.A in Computer Science and Mathematics from Grinnell College.

Outside of work, she loves to play multiple sports (for now tennis and basketball). She's also a huge Lebron fan.

founders.name: Philip Abel, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Philip has built multi-region infrastructure and services for years at industry giants such as AWS, Twilio, and Akamai Technologies. Originally from Nigeria, Philip's journey took him from Kano to MIT and Georgia Tech, where he studied computer science and engineering. His background is marked by resilience, and a commitment to making a positive impact in the world. Heâ€™s an FC Barcelona fan (soccer) and a big Lionel Messi fan.
